patch 8.2.1657: Vim9: no proper error for nested ":def!"

Problem:    Vim9: no proper error for nested ":def!".
Solution:   Check for "!". (closes #6920)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1657: Vim9: no proper error for nested ":def!" · vim/vim@8b848ca
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1657: Vim9: no proper error for nested ":def!" · vim/vim@8b848ca
attachments.text: Problem: Vim9: no proper error for nested ":def!". Solution: Check for "!". (closes #6920)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/dfa3d5524e816c1ff7f603f9f3b7703a53a0f822|patch 8.2.1656: Vim9: callstack wrong if :def function calls :def fun…>
patch 8.2.1656: Vim9: callstack wrong if :def function calls :def function

Problem:    Vim9: callstack wrong if :def function calls :def function.
Solution:   Set the line number before calling. (closes #6914)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1656: Vim9: callstack wrong if :def function calls :def fun… · vim/vim@dfa3d55
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1656: Vim9: callstack wrong if :def function calls :def fun… · vim/vim@dfa3d55
attachments.text: …ction Problem: Vim9: callstack wrong if :def function calls :def function. Solution: Set the line number before calling. (closes #6914)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/895a7a472d2eb4413e63cdad3213cb1ef1633458|patch 8.2.1655: cannot build with Strawberry Perl 5.32.0>
patch 8.2.1655: cannot build with Strawberry Perl 5.32.0

Problem:    Cannot build with Strawberry Perl 5.32.0.
Solution:   Use Perl_sv_2pvbyte_flags. (closes #6921)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.1655: cannot build with Strawberry Perl 5.32.0 · vim/vim@895a7a4
attachments.title: patch 8.2.1655: cannot build with Strawberry Perl 5.32.0 · vim/vim@895a7a4
attachments.text: Problem: Cannot build with Strawberry Perl 5.32.0. Solution: Use Perl_sv_2pvbyte_flags. (closes #6921)

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/ad9ec5e79916d206fd7677b77e36485c47ae534f|patch 8.2.1654: when job writes to hidden buffer current window is wrong>
patch 8.2.1654: when job writes to hidden buffer current window is wrong

Problem:    When job writes to hidden buffer current window has display
            errors.  (Johnny McArthur)
Solution:   Use aucmd_prepbuf() instead of switch_to_win_for_buf().
            (closes #6925)

patch 8.2.1653: expand('') does not include the final line number

Problem:    Expand('') does not include the final line number.
Solution:   Add the line nuber. (closes #6927)
